name: Main Accounts Balance Report
query:
select
A.root_type "Root type:150", parent_account ,  G.account  AS "Account:Link/Account:150" , 

IFNULL( sum(G.debit) - sum(G.credit),0)   AS "Balance:Link/Account:100"  from `tabGL Entry`  as G , `tabAccount` as A
where  G.account = A.name
and A.report_type = 'Balance Sheet'
and G.posting_date >= %(from_date)s
and G.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
and A.company = 'Somali Sudanese Specialized Hospital'
and G.docstatus = 1
group by G.account,A.report_type, A.root_type  ,parent_account 
ORDER BY A.root_type , parent_account;
